definition: to be dispersed/to break down/to fester/to ulcerate
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: A glof happens when a glacial lake is created by a melting glacier and it then bursts.
sentences.chinese: 融化的冰川形成冰川湖，隨後潰決，就會爆發洪水。

sentences.english: The water broke loose when the dam burst.
Viscous dam to break the process have had a significant impact.
sentences.chinese: 壩體粘性對潰決過程有重要影響。

sentences.english: Flood water resulted from break of natural rock-fill dam threatens the safety of downstream seriously.
sentences.chinese: 天然堆石壩潰決洪水，嚴重威脅下游的安全。
